climbs.name: Willey Brook Bandits
climbs.fa: Jonathan Garlough, Chris Magness & James Dickson

content.description: The first sport route you come to on the approach trail. Climb past a bolt on side pulls and clip a pin under the overlap. Fire the crux headwall using the arete, pockets, and crimps past three bolts to a bolt anchor.
content.location: The Willy Brook Ravine. The first wall on the approach trail. about 2 minutes from the bridge.

climbs.name: She Gave Us The Willy's
climbs.fa: James Dickson, Chris Magness & Jonathan Garlough

content.description: The climb starts just right of the sport route Willy Brook Bandits. Start up a small corner (bolt) and follow the ramp left into the corner. Follow the obvious corner placing gear and make the crux moves at a second bolt. Continue out the top placing gear to a bolt anchor over the lip.
content.protection: Standard Rack. Small wires and micros are useful at the top.

climbs.name: Fresh Squeezed
climbs.fa: Jonathan Garlough, Lincoln Tetherly & James Dickson

content.description: Start at a large birch tree growing against the cliff. Climb next to the birch on big holds and a crack placing gear to a good stance at a small birch before entering the chimney section. Jam the hand crack to the tight chimney at the top. Wiggle and grunt your way over the lip and walk back and belay from the tree.
content.location: The Willey Brook Ravine. From Hattie's Garden walk to the big bridge and cut right into the woods. Follow the climbers trail for 2 min to the crag.
